Hymn.Arabic: وَقَامَ مِنْ هُنَاكَ وَجَاءَ إِلَى تُخُومِ الْيَهُودِيَّةِ إِلَى عَبْرِ الْأُرْدُنِ ، فَاجْتَمَعَ إِلَيْهِ جُمُوعٌ أَيْضًا ، وَكَانَ يُعَلِّمُهُمْ كَعَادَتِهِ.
Hymn.English: 10:1 Then He arose from there and came to the region of Judea by the other side of the Jordan. And multitudes gathered to Him again, and as He was accustomed, He taught them again.

Hymn.Arabic: فَدَنَا الْفَرِّيسِيُّونَ وَسَأَلُوهُ لِيُجَرِّبُوهُ ، هَلْ يَحِلُّ لِلرَّجُلِ أَنْ يُطَلَّقَ امْرَأَتَهُ؟
Hymn.English: 2 The Pharisees came and asked Him, Is it lawful for a man to divorce his wife? testing Him.
3 And He answered and said to them, What did Moses command you?

Hymn.Arabic: فَقَالُوا : إِنَّ مُوسَى قَدْ أَذِنَ أَنْ يُكْتَبَ كِتَابُ طَلَاقٍ ، فَتُطَلَّقُ .
Hymn.English: 4 They said, Moses permitted a man to write a certificate of divorce, and to dismiss her.

Hymn.Arabic: فَأَجَابَ يَسُوعُ وَقَالَ لَهُمْ: مِنْ أَجْلِ قَسَاوَةِ قُلُوبِكُمْ كَتَبَ لَكُمْ هَذِهِ الْوَصِيَّةَ.
Hymn.English: 5 And Jesus answered and said to them, Because of the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept.

Hymn.Arabic: وَلَكِنْ مِنْ بَدْءِ الْخَلِيقَةِ ، ذَكَرًا وَأُنْثَى خلقَهُمَا اللَّهُ
Hymn.English: 6 But from the beginning of the creation, God `made them male and female.'

Hymn.Arabic: مِنْ أَجْلٍ هَذَا يَتْرُكُ الرَّجُلُ أَبَاهُ وَأُمَّهُ وَيَلْتَصِقُ بِامْرَأَتِهِ ،
Hymn.English: 7 `For this reason a man shall leave his father and mother and be joined to his wife,

Hymn.Arabic: فَيَصِيرَانِ كِلَاهُمَا جَسَدًا وَاحِدًا ، فَلَيْسَا هُمَا اثْنَيْنِ بَعْدُ وَلَكِنَّهُمَا جَسَدٌ وَاحِدٌ.
Hymn.English: 8 `and the two shall become one flesh'; so then they are no longer two, but one flesh.

Hymn.Arabic: وَمَا جَمَعَهُ اللَّهُ لَا يُفَرِّقُهُ إِنْسَانٌ
Hymn.English: 9 Therefore what God has joined together, let not man separate.

Hymn.Arabic: وَسَأَلَ تَلَامِيذَهُ أَيْضًا فِي الْبَيْتِ عَنْ ذَلِكَ.
Hymn.English: 10 In the house His disciples also asked Him again about the same matter.

Hymn.Arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ مَنْ طَلَّقَ امْرَأَتَهُ وَتَزَوَّجَ بِأخْرَى فَقَدْ زَنَى عَلَيْهَا ،
Hymn.English: 11 So He said to them, Whoever divorces his wife and marries another commits adultery against her.

Hymn.Arabic: وَإِنْ طَلَّقَتِ امْرَأَةٌ بَعْلَهَا وَتَزَوَّجَتْ بِآخَرَ فَقَدْ زَنَتْ
Hymn.English: 12 And if a woman divorces her husband and marries another, she commits adultery.
